data.actual_result: Saves and logs you right out, Public Beta on Android 6.0.1, Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge (reported for Frisk#4649)
data.expected_result: Saves and goes back to server last on/exit user settings
data.short_description: Saving changes on profile logs you right out
data.steps_to_repro: - Goto User Settings - Make at least one change even a minor one - Hit save (disk icon)
